title: Oat and treacle bread for the bread machine
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon butter', '1 teaspoon salt', '5 tablespoons treacle', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '300ml warm water', '1 1/2 tablespoons dried milk powder', '8 tablespoons porridge oats', '500g strong white bread flour', '2 teaspoons dried instant yeast', '4 tablespoons porridge oats']
